ingredients.ingredient: 26 ounces condensed cream of mushroom soup

cookingTips: Dissolve bouillon cubes in water before adding to soup for better distribution
Layer onions under chops so they soften and flavor the sauce
Keep covered with foil to trap steam and prevent sauce from reducing too much
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a simple one-dish meal. Why is beef bouillon important when the recipe already contains cream of mushroom soup?
